247.description: Toggles 24/7 mode, which prevents the bot from leaving the voice channel.

options.role: The role to add or remove.

options.info: Get information about the music channel.

movenode.description: Move the player to a different Lavalink node.

options.node: The name of the node to move to.

bassboost.description: Applies a bass boost audio effect.

options.level: The bass boost level (none, low, medium, high).

botinfo.description: Shows detailed information and statistics about the bot.

help.description: Shows a list of all commands.

options.command: The command to get help for.

help.title: Help Menu
help.content: Hi, I'm {bot}! My prefix is `{prefix}`. For more info about a command, type `{prefix}help <command>`.
help.footer: Use {prefix}help <command> for more info on a command.

invite.content: Click the button below to invite me!

lavalink.title: Lavalink Node Statistics

fairplay.description: Toggles FairPlay mode, which shuffles the queue to ensure everyone gets to play a song.

grab.description: Saves the current song to your DMs.

join.description: Makes the bot join your voice channel.

leave.description: Makes the bot leave the voice channel.

loop.description: Changes the loop mode (off, track, queue).

lyrics.description: Shows the lyrics of the current song or a specified song.

song.description: The song to get lyrics for.

play.description: Plays a song from YouTube, Spotify, etc.

options.song: The song or URL to play.

playnext.description: Adds a song to the top of the queue.

options.song: The song or URL to play next.

remove.description: Removes a song from the queue.

options.song: The number of the song to remove.

search.description: Searches for a song on YouTube.

seek.description: Seeks to a specific position in the song.

skipto.description: Skips to a specific song in the queue.

options.number: The number of the song to skip to.

stop.description: Stops the music and clears the queue.

addsong.description: Adds a song to a playlist.

options.name: The name for the new playlist.

options.playlist: The name of the playlist to delete.

list.description: Lists your playlists or the playlists of another user.

options.user: The user whose playlists to list.

load.description: Loads a playlist into the queue.

options.playlist: The name of the playlist to load.

removesong.description: Removes a song from a playlist.

options.song: The number of the song to remove.

steal.description: Saves another user's playlist as your own.

options.user: The user whose playlist to steal.
options.playlist: The name of the playlist to steal.

The loop mode you want to set: Please specify the loop mode you want to set.
